org.mobilesynergies.android.epic.service.administration
Class ConfigurationDatabase

java.lang.Object
  org.mobilesynergies.android.epic.service.administration.ConfigurationDatabase

public class ConfigurationDatabase
extends java.lang.Object

The user can set a permission for each installed package. The package permission is stored in this data base.
